isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - REMOVE - Extended Cab Rear Side Window

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Side Window on Extended Cab for all Models

step1.para: Remove passenger bucket seat, fixed passenger seat or fixed passenger bench seat, and if so equipped, full width rear bench seat. Refer to SEATS .
If so equipped, remove bunk/storage unit from behind front seats, refer to EXTENDED CAB BUNK/STORAGE UNIT .

Remove passenger side cab door opening scuff plate and seat belt retractor cover, refer to CAB DOOR OPENING SCUFF PLATE AND SEAT BELT RETRACTOR COVER
.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 104 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Open rear side window latch (Item 1) and remove rear side window seal (Item 2) by pulling it off the rear side window fence (Item 3).

Remove passenger side side and corner interior trim panel, refer to SIDE AND CORNER INTERIOR TRIM PANEL
. Remove Side and Corner Interior Trim Panel on Extended Cab for all Models.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 104 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: From inside the cab, remove two hex flanged bolts (Item 4) from rear side window latch (Item 1) at the rear of the rear side window (Item 5).
From inside the cab, remove two hex flanged nuts (Item 6) from threaded studs (Item 7) at the front of window opening for rear side window (Item 5).

From outside the cab, carefully pull threaded studs (Item 7) of rear side window (Item 5) out of mounting holes in rear side window fence (Item 3) removing rear side window from cab and place it on a padded work surface to protect it.

figure.caption: Figure 104. Extended Cab Rear Side Window on Extended Cab for all Models

step1.para: Repeat procedure to remove driver side rear side window on extended cab for all models.

svcsubproc.title: Remove Rear Side Window Latch from Rear Side Window on Extended Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 105 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: With the rear side window (Item 1) laying on a padded work surface latch side up.

Remove rear side window latch (Item 2) from the latch mounting pedestal (Item 3) on the rear side window by rotating rear side window latch clockwise until the latch bar (Item 4) is in line with latch mounting pedestal slot (Item 5) and lift the latch out. Lay rear side window latch out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
This procedure is the same to remove driver or passenger side rear side window latch on extended cab for all models.

figure.caption: Figure 105. Extended Cab Rear Side Window Latch on Extended Cab for all Models
